it.polimi.se2019.view.gui

Class MainScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.util.Observable<Request>
      • it.polimi.se2019.view.gui.MainScreen

  • public class MainScreen
extends Observable<Request>
    GUI controller of the main game scene, interact with all sub-controllers of the scene to handle game interactions and display correct data on the screen
    Author:
    Andrea Falanti

      • initializeBoardAndInfo

        public void initializeBoardAndInfo(Board board,
                                   int targetKills,
                                   PlayerColor activePlayerColor,
                                   int remainingActions,
                                   int turnNumber,
                                   java.util.List<Player> players,
                                   java.util.List<PlayerColor> kills,
                                   java.util.List<PlayerColor> overkills)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Load game board
        Parameters:
        board - Board to initialize
        targetKills - Kills target of the game
        activePlayerColor - Actual active player
        remainingActions - Remaining actions in this turn
        turnNumber - Actual turn number
        players - Players in the game
        kills - Actual kills done
        overkills - Actual overkills done
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if fxml is not found
